description: An identifiable dependent package package object.
title: dependent package

oneOf.description: A string defining version(s)requirements. Package-type specific.
oneOf.title: dependent package version requirement

oneOf.description: The scope of this dependency, such as runtime, install, etc. This is package-type specific and is the original scope string.
oneOf.title: dependency scope

oneOf.description: True if this dependency is an optional dependency
oneOf.title: is optional flag

oneOf.description: True if this dependency version requirement has been resolved and this dependency url points to an exact version.
oneOf.title: is resolved flag
